title: $1400 = $2000? Tom Cruise Has COVID Robots? 1.19.21
itunes:title: $1400 = $2000? Tom Cruise Has COVID Robots? 1.19.21
description:
In episode 793, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by White Homework's Tori Williams Douglass to discuss Biden's plan stimulus to help Americans, Senator James Lankford trying to save face poorly, Trump's border wall, Tom Cruise and covid robots, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Inside Biden’s $1.9 Trillion Plan to Help Struggling Americans
  2. Sen. James Lankford apologizes to Black Tulsans for questioning presidential election results
  3. UNITED AIRLINES THANKS PASSENGERS WHO AIDED MAN WITH COVID ... $200 Voucher for the CPR
  4. Is Donald Trump Going To The Alamo Total Landscaping?
  5. In South Texas, Trump says his border wall saves lives and jobs, and warns of danger from Biden’s looser policies
  6. Tom Cruise reportedly buys robots to enforce COVID-19 safety on film set
  7. No, Tom Cruise Did Not Bring Scary COVID-19 Robots to the Set of ‘Mission: Impossible 7’
  8. WATCH: ooh la la (feat. Mexican Institute Of Sound & Santa Fe Klan) (Mexican Institute Of Sound Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
